about_the_game:
The game is in intense development! It is expected to be officially launched at the end of the third quarter of 2024! Interested friends are welcome to join the group to learn about the latest developments of the game!
[The game store currently only uses translation software to generate (the quality may be poor, please forgive me), the official version of the game will use professional translation companies to translate and produce the plot!]
↓QQ Li Yu Technology Release Group: 469744523 QQ Lizard Learning Eastward Group 1: 820720682 ↓


Core gameplay
Operating an interstellar communication academy, maintaining the relationship between the "lizard people" and the "elven race" while properly managing the school! The "lizard" school is gradually spreading to the east

Managing the many physical objects that occur in the school, interacting with the four beautiful girl characters, and learning about their backstories



Reasonably arrange the policies for students to maintain the stability of "academic value"


We cannot leave the economy behind! We cannot go bankrupt!!!

Of course, your goal is to build an interstellar friendly exchange college, and you cannot be too commercialized!


Zheng Ce, who maintains harmony between the "lizard people" and "elf race" and balances the students and teachers of the two races


Run your school! Mr. Principal! The Evriya Interstellar Exchange Academy is waiting for your construction!



The game's name, "The Eastern Invasion of Western Learning," is derived from the Chinese idiom "The Eastern Invasion of Western Learning," which refers to the historical process of the spread of Western academic thought to China from the late Ming Dynasty to modern times. Part of the inspiration for the game comes from the setting of "Tianren" in "Gintama," and the other part comes from the remarkable imagination of foreign people. The story takes place in a fantasy world called Evilia, where peaceful indigenous people - elves and predators from outer space - lizards have fought a life-and-death battle. Fortunately, the invaders failed to defeat the indomitable struggle of the elves; unfortunately, the elves did not have enough power to completely drive out the invaders from their homeland. Players will play as a principal of an interstellar communication college, seizing a strange but rare strategic opportunity period, and striving to balance various forces and ideologies in a treacherous situation. Players can sincerely accept the guidance of the advanced civilization of lizards with open hearts; they can seek peace cautiously, growing in strength while dancing with wolves; or they can shatter this false illusion, defeat the conspiracy of lizards, and reignite the raging flames of war.



The school run by the player, the Evelia Interstellar Exchange Academy, is a highly sensitive area where various forces converge. Once the fragile balance is broken, the school will be difficult to survive no matter what the outcome is. Players need to control the four values of academics, discipline, favor of foreign races, and economy in the game and keep them within a reasonable range. For example, too low an academic value will cause the school to fail to complete basic teaching tasks, while too high an academic value will cause the Lizard People to be wary and defensive; too low a favor value will prompt the Lizard People to take hostile actions, while too high a favor value will make your fellow elves doubt your position... The game has prepared rich plots, events, and multiple endings, and looks forward to your exploration from the heart.






Produced by Jianerdui Production Group, Distributed by LICOGAME
↓QQ Li Yu Technology Release Group: 469744523 QQ Lizard Learning Group 1: 820720682 ↓

name: Geckorientalism

subs.option_text: 蜥学东渐—蓝血与尖耳朵 - $8.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-5100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX460
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: have
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: have

short_description: The game takes place in a fantasy world called Evelia, where the peaceful indigenous people, the elves, and the alien predators, the lizards, have fought a life-and-death battle. The story takes place after the war. Fortunately, the invaders failed to defeat the indomitable struggle of the elves
